Nov. 18, 2000 D SEWBBA (Treorchy) Contest (Fourth Section)
SEWBBA (Treorchy) Contest (Fourth Section) 40 Test Piece Contest SEWBBA (Treorchy) Contest sewbba-treorchy-contest-fourth-section
Entertainments Contest
Parc & Dare Theatre, Treorchy, Rhondda Cynon Taf, Wales, UK Best Instrumentalist: Eb Bass, Llanelli Prizes - 1st £150, 2nd £90, 3rd £60. 6 bands competed.
Jan. 13, 2012, 10:47 a.m. July 2, 2020, 12:45 p.m.
1 Severn Tunnel Band J. Williams
2 Aberystwyth Youth Band Alan Phillips
3 Newtown Silver Band (Wales) R. A. Lloyd
4 Llanelli Band L. Waters
5 Ystradgynlais Public Band Aled Jones
6 Briton Ferry Band Mike Faro
